organization.title: Organization Settings
organization.description: Manage your organization details and team members.

name.label: Organization Name
name.maxLength: Organization name must be less than 100 characters

logo.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload JPEG, PNG, or WebP.
logo.tooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}.

members.title: Team Members
members.description: Invite and manage team members and their roles.

inboundEmail.description: Configure your unique email address for receipt processing.

alias.title: Your Receipt Email
alias.description: Forward receipts to this email address for automatic processing.

verification.title: Email Verification
verification.description: Verify your email configuration is working correctly.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.description: Configure when and how you receive notifications.

receiptProcessed.label: Receipt Processed
receiptProcessed.description: Get notified when a receipt is successfully processed

dailySummary.label: Daily Summary
dailySummary.description: Receive a daily summary of your transactions

weeklySummary.description: Receive a weekly summary of your spending

emails.title: Notification Emails
emails.description: Add email addresses to receive notifications.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Export your data and manage your account.

export.title: Export Data
export.description: Download your transaction data in various formats.

dateRange.label: Date Range
dateRange.invalid: Please select a valid date range

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Irreversible actions that will permanently delete your data.

deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your organization and all associated data.

dialog.title: Delete Organization
dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. All data will be permanently deleted.

integrations.description: Connect ChiPhi AI with your favorite tools and services.
